raw_comment: I noticed that there are more players of color who play in professional sport leagues. I wonder if how this data compares to previous years, and if this is a consistent trend. The impact that this has on my community, is that it gives them more motivation as to why they want to go pro, or join a league. A catchy headline that captures the graph main idea could be "Diversity in Professional sports" .
ace_sentences: I noticed that more players of color play in professional sport leagues.
I wonder how this data compares to previous years.
I wonder if this is a consistent trend.
This situation has an impact on my community.
This situation gives more motivation to people in my community.
This motivation influences why they want to become professional players.
This motivation influences why they want to join a league.
The headline is: Diversity in professional sports.
